original_title: Duminda Hulangamuwa to head EY Sri Lanka and Maldives
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Duminda Hulangamuwa, has been appointed as the Country Managing Partner of Ernst & Young for Sri Lanka and Maldives effective from July 01 2023 onwards, a company statement said.
Hulangamuwa will be succeeding Manil Jayesinghe, who will be retiring from June 30 2023.
Hulangamuwa who has experience of 30 years in the industry, is a member of the Chartered Institute of Accountants of Sri Lanka and the Chartered Institute of Management Accountants (UK).
He obtained his bachelor of Laws from the University of London.  (Colombo/ June 29/2023)
